title: Scrooge McDuck and money (K)
brief_description: The history and value of money is retold in an amusing and entertaining manner to three young ducks by their wealthy uncle Scrooge McDuck. The wise old man also offers advice on budgeting and taxes.
description: The history and value of money is retold in an amusing and entertaining manner to three young ducks by their wealthy uncle Scrooge McDuck. The wise old man also offers advice on budgeting and taxes.
